name: Iteria ROOMS
desc: Online floor plan planner with extensive furnishing options, iteria ROOMS is primarily used as a solution for the creation of professional floor plans for the marketing of real estate. With just a few clicks, you can draw professional floor plans

name: Loader
desc: Online editor of 3D scenes, like Clara.io. That is, online you can build a full-fledged scene in 3D and walk around it, you can throw physics, objects, shapes.

name: Box room
desc: In this component, you can drag and drop pieces of furniture in the dynamics and join them together. You can replace them with internal and external coating materials.

name: PopEvents
desc: Home project for learning technology Java Platform, Enterprise Edition
